remarks: Value of the strong sequence builder function.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Apr-2019.)
statement:
sseqval.1 $e |- ( ph -> S e. _V ) $.
sseqval.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. Word S ) $.
sseqval.3 $e |- W = ( Word S i^i ( `' # " ( ZZ>= ` ( # ` M ) ) ) ) $.
sseqval.4 $e |- ( ph -> F : W --> S ) $.
sseqfv2.4 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` ( # ` M ) ) ) $.
sseqfv2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( M seqstr F ) ` N ) = ( lastS ` ( seq ( # ` M ) ( ( x e. _V , y e. _V |-> ( x concat <" ( F ` x ) "> ) ) , ( NN0 X. { ( M concat <" ( F ` M ) "> ) } ) ) ` N ) ) ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d W x y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ph x y $.
